languages.text: {n}Старый офицер вздыхает и окидывает вас странным взглядом.{/n} "Я... могу согласиться с тем, что ваше произведение в новый статус произошло внезапно и поспешно. Поверьте, тому есть хорошие причины — хотя бы начать с того, что корабль, лишившийся Лорд-капитана, ждут только беды... впрочем, я отвлекся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Старый офицер вздыхает и окидывает вас странным взглядом.{/n} "Я... могу согласиться с тем, что ваше произведение в новый статус произошло внезапно и поспешно. Поверьте, тому есть хорошие причины — хотя бы начать с того, что корабль, лишившийся Лорд-капитана, ждут только беды... впрочем, я отвлекся".

languages.text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."
languages.original_text: {n}Старый офицер вздыхает и окидывает вас странным взглядом.{/n} "Я... могу согласиться с тем, что ваше произведение в новый статус произошло внезапно и поспешно. Поверьте, тому есть хорошие причины — хотя бы начать с того, что корабль, лишившийся Лорд-капитана, ждут только беды... впрочем, я отвлекся".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

{n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

{n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

{n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

languages.text: {n}这位年迈的军官喘着粗气，以古怪的眼神看着你。{/n}“我……我确实同意，您的升迁实在是过于仓促。我向您保证，这么做是很有必要的。如果没有领主舰长，这艘飞船将难逃一劫，而且理由不仅仅只有这些……不过，我有点离题太远了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位年迈的军官喘着粗气，以古怪的眼神看着你。{/n}“我……我确实同意，您的升迁实在是过于仓促。我向您保证，这么做是很有必要的。如果没有领主舰长，这艘飞船将难逃一劫，而且理由不仅仅只有这些……不过，我有点离题太远了。”

languages.text: {n}老士官は息を呑み、奇妙な目であなたを見る。{/n}「…あなたの新しい地位への昇格がかなり急激だったことには同意いたします。それにはそれなりの理由があるのです。少なくとも、ロード・キャプテンがいなければ、この船は間違いなく大惨事を迎えていたことでしょう…さて、話が逸れましたな」
languages.original_text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

traits.locale_text: {n}老士官は息を呑み、奇妙な目であなたを見る。{/n}「…あなたの新しい地位への昇格がかなり急激だったことには同意いたします。それにはそれなりの理由があるのです。少なくとも、ロード・キャプテンがいなければ、この船は間違いなく大惨事を迎えていたことでしょう…さて、話が逸れましたな」

languages.text: {n}Der alte Offizier schnappt nach Luft und sieht dich prüfend an.{/n} "Ich ... räume ein, dass die Beförderung zu Eurem neuen Status etwas überstürzt erfolgte. Ich versichere Euch, es gibt gute Gründe dafür – nicht zuletzt den, dass das Schiff ohne einen Lord Captain dem Untergang geweiht wäre ... aber ich schweife ab."
languages.original_text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Offizier schnappt nach Luft und sieht dich prüfend an.{/n} "Ich ... räume ein, dass die Beförderung zu Eurem neuen Status etwas überstürzt erfolgte. Ich versichere Euch, es gibt gute Gründe dafür – nicht zuletzt den, dass das Schiff ohne einen Lord Captain dem Untergang geweiht wäre ... aber ich schweife ab."

languages.text: {n}Le vieil officier s'étrangle, avant de vous dévisager.{/n} « Je... reconnais que l'accession à votre nouveau statut s'est faite de manière expéditive. Je peux cependant vous assurer qu'il y a de bonnes raisons à cela, notamment le fait que sans seigneur-capitaine, le vaisseau est voué au désastre... mais je m'égare. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil officier s'étrangle, avant de vous dévisager.{/n} « Je... reconnais que l'accession à votre nouveau statut s'est faite de manière expéditive. Je peux cependant vous assurer qu'il y a de bonnes raisons à cela, notamment le fait que sans seigneur-capitaine, le vaisseau est voué au désastre... mais je m'égare. »

languages.text: {n}El anciano oficial da un grito ahogado y te mira con extrañeza.{/n} «Eh... estoy de acuerdo en que su ascenso a su nuevo puesto ha sido considerablemente precipitado. Le aseguro que hay buenos motivos para ello, incluyendo el hecho de que, sin Lord Capitán, esta nave estaría condenada al desastre... pero estoy divagando».
languages.original_text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano oficial da un grito ahogado y te mira con extrañeza.{/n} «Eh... estoy de acuerdo en que su ascenso a su nuevo puesto ha sido considerablemente precipitado. Le aseguro que hay buenos motivos para ello, incluyendo el hecho de que, sin Lord Capitán, esta nave estaría condenada al desastre... pero estoy divagando».

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı subayın nutku tutuluyor, sana tuhaf tuhaf bakıyor.{/n} "Yeni makamınıza terfinizin biraz... Aceleye geldiği doğru. Emin olun bir Lord Kaptan olmadan geminin felakete sürükleneceği gibi geçerli sebepler yüzünden böyle oldu. İsteğinize gelince..."
languages.original_text: {n}The old officer gasps and looks at you oddly.{/n} "I... do agree that your elevation to your new status was rather precipitous. I assure you there are good reasons for it — not least the fact that without a Lord Captain, the ship would be destined for naught but disaster... but I digress."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı subayın nutku tutuluyor, sana tuhaf tuhaf bakıyor.{/n} "Yeni makamınıza terfinizin biraz... Aceleye geldiği doğru. Emin olun bir Lord Kaptan olmadan geminin felakete sürükleneceği gibi geçerli sebepler yüzünden böyle oldu. İsteğinize gelince..."
